title: Introrse: Where the Spirits Speak
description: Smartly written, original, and well developed. Introrse is a fascinating look at a Romanesque society in which characters address intellectual issues, struggles with faith, competing philosophies and culture war, acutely paralleling modern day America. The Apocalypse seems to be quicky approaching on planet Hytrae, and the Nytrez family, Grandfather Nusa, Father Trell, and Son Doyen, must deal with inner demons to discover and stand for truth in the troubled times. The item is Returnable
author: Randy  Martin
